text: Exmore is the largest town in Northampton County. It is on the Eastern Shore of the U.S. state of Virginia. The population was 1,473 at the 2020 census. A popular story is that Exmore got its name because it is the tenth railroad station south of the Delaware state line, so there were "X more" stations left on a passenger's journey.History of Exmore History page on official website. ==References== Category:Towns in Virginia Category:Northampton County, Virginia
title: Exmore, Virginia
